124.content:
Louis was enjoying his time off that Saturday afternoon. The guys from One Direction had enjoyed a smashing concert on Friday night in the large concert hall in London and there were thousands of people there, absolutely rocking to the latest hits of the popular British boy band that was taking the entire world by storm!

Louis looked in the mirror and realized that he had actually lost some weight from all the time spent on the road, hustling from hotel to the stages, running, singing and sleeping when he had the chance and eating little food on the bus, the plane or in the hotel room. But, he had little time to exercise or work out in the gym, and he didn't have much of an appetite for food at all since he was always running around going from place to place for concerts, meet-ups with fans, interviews, or sessions in the recording studio. He was consistently losing weight, and he was becoming a bit too skinny. What was he to do?

As he stared in the mirror, he heard a knocking on the door of the hotel room. All the other guys were sleeping so he just opened the door. There was nobody there, but when he looked down, he spotted a small package on the ground. He looked both ways and when he spotted nobody, he picked up the package and closed and locked the door behind him.

"Strange! No name on here and no return address?" Louis wondered, as he set the package on the desk in the corner. He found a pair of scissors in the desk drawer. He used that to cut the packing tape, before he was able to open the box. Once open, a small plastic bottle rolled out of the box. Louis took the bottle and looked at the label. All it said on there was "Muscle Enhancer for 1D".

Louis unscrewed the cap on the bottle and he saw that the bottle contained several small tablets. They looked like aspirin tablets. Should he take one? Louis just shrugged. He felt like he could use some additional muscle on his frame for sure. So, he walked into the bathroom and poured some water in the empty glass. Then, he took one tablet and placed it in his mouth. He washed it down with some water from the glass. There. He took a muscle enhancer pill! Would it work on him?
